snippet: The film follows Christina Noble, who emerged from a traumatic childhood in Dublin to build a foundation that helps thousands of children in Vietnam and Mongolia.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews movie Noble, written and directed by Stephen Bradley and starring Deirdre O'Kane.
lead_paragraph: The film follows Christina Noble, who emerged from a traumatic childhood in Dublin to build a foundation that helps thousands of children in Vietnam and Mongolia.

headline.main: Review: ‘Noble,’ the Crusade of a Children’s Rights Activist
headline.print_headline: Finding Her Calling Far From Home
